headline: Here's Why This Door Technology Company's Stock Surged Today
summary: Locks and access door company Allegion (NYSE: ALLE) stock had risen by 10.3% at 11 a.m. ET.  The tariff turmoil threatens nearly all manufacturers, and they may be unable to pass on increased supply chain costs.  The good news is that it can continue because Allegion's underlying fundamentals remain strong.

headline: Allegion's Q1 Earnings & Revenues Surpass Estimates, Increase Y/Y
summary: ALLE's first-quarter revenues increase 5.4% year over year, driven by solid momentum in the non-residential business in the Americas region.

headline: Allegion (ALLE) Q1 Earnings and Revenues Top Estimates
summary: Allegion (ALLE) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 10.71% and 1.11%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Allegion (ALLE) Q1 Earnings and Revenues Top Estimates

headline: Allegion (NYSE:ALLE) Exceeds Q1 Expectations
summary: Security hardware provider Allegion (NYSE:ALLE) beat Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, with sales up 5.4% year on year to $941.9 million. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.86 per share was 11.2% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

raw.headline: Allegion (NYSE:ALLE) Exceeds Q1 Expectations
raw.summary: Security hardware provider Allegion (NYSE:ALLE) beat Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, with sales up 5.4% year on year to $941.9 million. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.86 per share was 11.2% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Allegion: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The results surpassed Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of three analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $1.68 per share. The security device maker posted revenue of $941.9 million in the period.

headline: Allegion (NYSE: ALLE) Reports Q1-2025 Financial Results
summary: DUBLIN, April 24, 2025--Allegion plc (NYSE: ALLE), a leading global security products and solutions provider, today reported financial results for its first quarter (ended March 31, 2025).
